title: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately without honouring the cancellation request.4) Eventually, the exception list comes up, but it ignores the cancellation request. It should either honour the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. The cancel button should be disabled by passing false for the 'cancellable' parameter when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run.
EB: When adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog should not close immediately. It should either honour the cancellation request or disable the cancel button. The exception list should not appear if the cancellation request is made. To resolve this issue, pass false for the 'cancellable' parameter when calling ProgressMonitorDialog.run.
